entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Creston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Creston 12:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: SE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
